Submodules¶

pytraj.datafiles.load_cpptraj_file module¶

for compatibility with cpptraj >>> from pytraj import load_cpptraj_file >>> state = load_cpptraj_file(trajin_file) >>> isinstance(state, CpptrajState)

>>> # state object hold all information like TopologyList, DataSetList,
TrajinList, ...
pytraj.datafiles.load_cpptraj_file.load_cpptraj_file(fname)¶
Parameters:

fname : str, name of cpptraj input file

(“cpptraj -i input.txt” –> fname = “input.txt”)

pytraj.datafiles.load_sample_data module¶

pytraj.datafiles.load_sample_data.load_sample_data(data_name=None)¶

Return TrajectoryIterator instance for Ala3 or tz2 data

Notes

tz2 dataset : $AMBERHOME/AmberTools/test/cpptraj/
explicit water, ortho box
